content.thinking: 用户想要安装 dev-tools MCP。让我先搜索一下相关信息，看看 dev-tools MCP 是什么以及如何安装。

content.text: 我来搜索 dev-tools MCP 的相关信息。

content.content:
Web search results for query: "dev-tools MCP server installation Claude 2025"

Links: [{"title":"GitHub - ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp: Chrome DevTools for coding agents","url":"https://github.com/ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"How to Set Up Chrome DevTools MCP with Claude Code to Automate Websites That Need Authentication","url":"https://raf.dev/blog/chrome-debugging-profile-mcp/"},{"title":"Chrome DevTools MCP | MCP Servers · LobeHub","url":"https://lobehub.com/mcp/benjaminr-chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"Connect to local MCP servers - Model Context Protocol","url":"https://modelcontextprotocol.io/docs/develop/connect-local-servers"},{"title":"GitHub - benjaminr/chrome-devtools-mcp: An MCP Server for Chrome DevTools, following the Chrome DevTools Protocol. Integrates with Claude Desktop and Claude Code.","url":"https://github.com/benjaminr/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"Chrome DevTools MCP | Awesome MCP Servers","url":"https://mcpservers.org/servers/benjaminr/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"Chrome DevTools MCP: AI browser debugging complete guide 2025 | Vladimir Siedykh","url":"https://vladimirsiedykh.com/blog/chrome-devtools-mcp-ai-browser-debugging-complete-guide-2025"},{"title":"Claude Code Browser MCP Setup | MCP Servers · LobeHub","url":"https://lobehub.com/mcp/haasonsaas-claude-code-browser-mcp-setup"},{"title":"Getting Browser Tools MCP Server Working with Claude Code: A Simple 2-Step Solution - Augustin Chan Dev Blog","url":"https://augchan42.github.io/2025/08/02/configuring-browser-tools-mcp-claude-code/"},{"title":"Add MCP Servers to Claude Code with MCP Toolkit | Docker","url":"https://www.docker.com/blog/add-mcp-servers-to-claude-code-with-mcp-toolkit/"}]

Based on my search, here's what I found about dev-tools MCP server installation for Claude in 2025:

## Chrome DevTools MCP Server

Chrome-devtools-mcp lets your coding agent (such as Gemini, Claude, Cursor or Copilot) control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It acts as a Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) server, giving your AI coding assistant access to the full power of Chrome DevTools for reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis.

### Installation Methods

**For Claude Code CLI:**
Use the Claude Code CLI to add the Chrome DevTools MCP server: `claude mcp add chrome-devtools --scope user npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest`(no content)Claude Code provides a streamlined command for adding MCP servers using the built-in `claude mcp add` command. Claude Code automatically handles the MCP server configuration and restart process.

**For Claude Desktop:**
The server can be installed as a Claude Desktop Extension (.dxt) or run manually with Python.(no content)It's available as a Claude Desktop Extension (.dxt) for easy one-click installation.

### Manual Configuration
IMPORTANT: Claude Code needs absolute paths to both the Python interpreter and the server script to work correctly.(no content)Example of correct Claude Code configuration (with absolute paths): `{ "command": "/Users/you/chrome-devtools-mcp/.venv/bin/python", "args": ["/Users/you/chrome-devtools-mcp/server.py"], "env": { "CHROME_DEBUG_PORT": "9222" } }`

### Key Requirements
The key principles are: launch Chrome with `--remote-debugging-port` and `--user-data-dir`, then configure your agent's MCP server to connect via `--browserUrl`.(no content)Requires Chrome launched with remote debugging enabled on port 9222.

### Docker MCP Toolkit Alternative
MCP connects Claude Code to your real tools, databases, repositories, browsers, and APIs, while Docker MCP Toolkit makes setup effortless and secure. Claude Code was recently added as a client that you can easily enable with one click in Docker Desktop.(no content)With more than 200 pre-built, containerized MCP servers, one-click deployment in Docker Desktop, and automatic credential handling, developers can connect Claude Code to trusted environments in minutes — not hours. No dependency issues, no manual configuration.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

input.prompt: Find information about installing MCP servers with claude mcp add command, specifically dev-tools or chrome-devtools-mcp

content.content:
# Claude Code MCP Installation

Based on the GitHub repository content provided, I don't see specific documentation about installing MCP servers using the `claude mcp add` command or details about `dev-tools` or `chrome-devtools-mcp`.

However, the repository does reference:

1. **MCP Registry** - There's a link to [GitHub MCP Registry](https://github.com/mcp) which is mentioned as a platform to "Integrate external tools"

2. **Official Documentation** - The README directs users to [code.claude.com/docs/en/overview](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview) for comprehensive guides

For information about:
- Installing MCP servers with `claude mcp add`
- `dev-tools` or `chrome-devtools-mcp` specifically
- MCP server configuration

You should refer to:
- The official [Claude Code documentation](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview)
- The [GitHub MCP Registry](https://github.com/mcp)
- The setup documentation at [code.claude.com/docs/en/setup](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/setup)

These resources will have the most current and detailed information about MCP server installation and configuration options.

content.thinking: 让我直接帮用户安装 chrome-devtools-mcp。根据搜索结果，可以使用 `claude mcp add` 命令来安装。

content.text: 根据搜索结果，你想安装的应该是 **Chrome DevTools MCP**。我来帮你安装。

input.command: claude mcp add chrome-devtools --scope user -- npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest
input.description: Install Chrome DevTools MCP server for Claude Code

content.content:
Added stdio MCP server chrome-devtools with command: npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest to user config
File modified: /home/aiscend/.claude.json

toolUseResult.stdout:
Added stdio MCP server chrome-devtools with command: npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest to user config
File modified: /home/aiscend/.claude.json

content.thinking: 成功安装了。现在我需要告诉用户如何使用它。

content.text:
Chrome DevTools MCP 已安装成功。

**使用前需要做的事情：**

1. **启动 Chrome 并启用远程调试：**
   ```bash
   google-chrome --remote-debugging-port=9222 --user-data-dir=/tmp/chrome-debug
   ```

2. **重启 Claude Code 会话** 使 MCP 生效

**功能：**
- 自动化浏览器操作
- 调试网页
- 性能分析
- 处理需要身份验证的网站

**Sources:**
- [Chrome DevTools MCP GitHub](https://github.com/ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp)
- [Chrome DevTools MCP 安装指南](https://raf.dev/blog/chrome-debugging-profile-mcp/)

data.command: node -e "const{execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{execSync('git rev-parse --git-dir',{stdio:'pipe'})}catch{console.log(d);process.exit(0)}try{const files=execSync('git diff --name-only HEAD',{encoding:'utf8',stdio:['pipe','pipe','pipe']}).split('\n').filter(f=>/\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$/.test(f)&&fs.existsSync(f));let hasConsole=false;for(const f of files){if(fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8').includes('console.log')){console.error('[Hook] WARNING: console.log found in '+f);hasConsole=true}}if(hasConsole)console.error('[Hook] Remove console.log statements before committing')}catch(e){}console.log(d)})"

content.thinking: 用户想要配置 Sonnet 模型的别名 (alias)。这应该是在 Claude Code 中配置模型别名的设置。

content.text:
在 Claude Code 中配置 Sonnet 别名，可以在 `~/.claude.json` 中添加：

```json
{
  "model": {
    "aliases": {
      "sonnet": "claude-sonnet-4-20250514"
    }
  }
}
```

或者使用命令行设置默认模型：

```bash
claude config set model claude-sonnet-4-20250514
```

**常用模型 ID：**
| 别名 | 模型 ID |
|------|---------|
| sonnet | `claude-sonnet-4-20250514` |
| opus | `claude-opus-4-5-20251101` |
| haiku | `claude-haiku-4-5-20251101` |

**使用方式：**
```bash
# 启动时指定模型
claude --model sonnet

# 或在会话中切换
/model sonnet
```
